body_text: My brain is broken and so I don't remember this thing. It doesn't seem to be in this diff. I can't find it in mozilla-central. It also doesn't seem to be in the list of modules to unload in bootstrap.js - I'm assuming that's just an oversight and this got added elsewhere? Or something?
